1.「おきゃくさんでは ないのよ。| テティはね ほんきできたの！: I'm not a customer. Tetti is a real person!

2.<if_woman>「おねえちゃん みててね。| テティ あそこから| ロープな:
Watch me, lady. Tetti, I'm going to|step down from there without a rope!|Young man, watch me. Tetti, I'm going to|
|jump down from there without a rope!

7.「みたみた？ やっぱり テティは | たすかっちゃうんだよ～！: Did you see that?　Tetti is going to save you!

8.「ロープを付けずに 飛び降りるとは……。| おじょうちゃん あんな危険なこと|: Jumping off without a rope... Pops, don't ever|do anything dangerous like that again!

10.「つぎはね……プ プクリッポ地方？ ってとこの| むらさき色の きりが モクモク:
Next, I want you to take me to the bottom of|the valley of the wounded.　I want you to take|me to the bottom of the valley of the wounded|
|where the purple woodpeckers are growing!

12.「そこにはね コワ～イ魔物がいるのよ！| よろしく おねがいします！: There's a scary monster in there! I'm looking|forward to working with you!

15.<if_woman>「おねえちゃん みててね。| テティ あいつを ひとりでやっ: <if_woman>Look at me, girl. Tetti, I'll take|him down by myself! <else>Young man, watch.|Tetti, I'll defeat him by myself! <endif>

16.<if_woman>「おねえちゃん おそいよ～。みててね。| テティ 今度こそ:
Onee-chan, you're late! Watch me.|Tetti, I'll get him this time! Younger|man, I'm late! Oniichan, you're late!|
|Tetti, I'll get him this time!

17.「だいじょうぶ！ テティは ぜったい| だいじょうぶだから みてて！: I'm fine!　Tetti is absolutely fine, watch!

22.<if_woman>「おねえちゃんが たおしてくれたのね……？| そっか～ そう:
So, you were the one who helped|me...? I see~ That's how it works! That's why|Tetti's not in pain! Your young man|
|saved you...? I see~ That's how it works!|That's why Tetti can't be hush-hush!

23.「あのね あのね……| テティが転んだのは ぐうぜんじゃないんだよ。: You see, you see...Tetti is not in bums for|falling down.

24.「テティはね ぜったいに しなないの。| どんなことがあっても| ぜったいに ま: Tetti is never going to die. She will be|protected no matter what!

26.「だって！ シスター・サテラが| そういったんだもん！: Because!　Because Sister Satella said so!

27.「町のみんなは…… シスター・サテラのこと | ウソの予言をした わるい人だって: Everyone in town says Sister Satella is a|wicked person who made a false prophecy. I|told them over and over again that's not true.

28.「だから テティは| シスター・サテラの予言が ホントウだって| みんなに しん: That's why Tetti wanted everyone to believe|that Sister Satella's prophecy was true...

29.「どうしても やらなきゃいけない……| って思ったの！: I just knew I had to do it!

30.<if_woman>「……おねえちゃんのおかげで| シスター・サテラが のこして:
...thanks to you, I can tell|everyone that the prophecy Sister Satella gave|me was true! ...thanks to young man, I|
|can tell everyone that the prophecy Sister|Satella gave me was true! ...

31.「テティを ここまで 連れてきてくれて| ありがとう……。| お礼に テティのた: Thank you for bringing Tetti here... and for|that, I give you Tetti's treasure!

32.「テティは レンドア島の教会で| シスター・サテラが 帰るのを まってるね！: Tetti is waiting for Sister Satella to return|to the Church on Lendor Island!

33.バジエドは テティの足に|バンジーの命綱を 引っかけた！: Bajiedo hooks the bungee lifeline to Tetti's|leg!
